document.full_text: waves of protesters blocked a main thoroughfare to bahrain financial harbour on sunday, a major business district in the gulf arab banking center, facing off with police who fired clouds of tear gas and water cannon.
document.title: bahrain protesters block highway, confront police
lines_and_colors: waves of protesters blocked a main thoroughfare to bahrain financial harbour on sunday, a major business district in the gulf arab banking center, facing off with police who fired clouds of tear gas and water cannon.
